title: Apparently (per the pop-up which appears on my screen) it's time to update Firefox . . . doesn't happen
content:
Presently 142.0.1 (64-bit) installed; previous updates/downloads had no problems.

Now, however, going to https://www.firefox.com/en-US/?utm_campaign=SET_DEFAULT_BROWSER and attempt a download results in this (image).

Any solution to this?

Thank you.
creator: Hikermann

title: Web app shows Firefox icon instead of the site icon when PINNED TO START
content:
This may be a small issue but it's pretty bothering, I do understand that the web app as of now is primarily to be pinned at the taskbar, but would this be done in the start menu in the future? I mainly keep my apps at the start menu for my convenience.

Basically the problem here is the shortcut icon, so take this Messenger web app as an example. If I pin this to taskbar, or even make a desktop shortcut, it's showing the correct icon, it's also in the start menu but unpinned. However, when I pin it to the start menu, in the app catalog, it changes to the Firefox icon (for some reason the one on the taskbar sometimes does that as well).

I've tried looking into the Properties tab of the shortcut, but apparently it's already set to the Messenger icon, so I'm guessing it's primarily the start menu problem.
creator: swannah016

title: Bookmarks and History gone after crash
content:
Had a crash earlier on my macbook that required a restart. Everything else is fine but I have lost all history and bookmark data on my firefox browser. I tried going to see if i had the wrong profile and that was not the issue. I tired recovering the bookmarks in the manage boomarks option but there were no backup files.

I have some important bookmarks i need recovered. Any help would be highly appreciated.
creator: blazingice260

title: NOT ABLE TO WORK WITH VENDOR WEBSITE
content: I sign onto BROTHER-USA.COM to inquire about ink for my Brother printer. I key in the model and get a "Drivers Search Results" with no printer found nor displayed. Keeps looping or searching, I suppose. This same inquire works fine with any other browser, but not Firefox. Can you advise which Firefox settings is preventing any response from the Brother website? Thanks, Joe
creator: joecarbo

title: BROTHER PRINTERS COMPANY WILL NOT RECOGNIZE MODEL INQUIRES.  IT LOOPS WITH NOTHING FOUND.
content: WHAT SETTING CAN I ADJUST TO ALLOW THE BROTHER PRINTER COMPANY AT BROTHER-USE.COM TO BE ABLE TO SEARCH THEIR DATABASE FOR MY PRINTER WHEN I TYPE IN ITS MODEL NUMBER? SAME NOTHING-FOUND LOOP OCCURS WHEN I INQUIRE ABOUT INK BASED ON A MODEL NUMBER THAT IT CAN NOT FIND. ALL WORKS WELL ON NORTON OR GOOGLE BROWSERS. THANKS. ALSO, MAY I CALL YOU TO DISCUSS RATHER THAT SUPERFLOUS EMAILS BACK AND FORTH? CAN YOU CALL ME IF MY NUMBER IS ON FILE, OR IF YOU ASK FOR IT? THANKS, jOE
creator: joecarbo
